    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static void load()
        Load function. Use the date from the CSV file to create the cinema objects.

      • add

        public static void add(Cinema cinema)
        Add new cinema to the cinema class(used by admin).
        Parameters:
        cinema - cinema objects that the admin has typed in.

      • getCinemaList

        public static List<Cinema> getCinemaList()
        Get the list of cinema objects
        Returns:
        the list of cinema objects

      • getCinemaListByCineplex

        public static List<Cinema> getCinemaListByCineplex(String cineplexName)
        Get the list of cinemas that are belong to the cineplex
        Parameters:
        cineplexName - that is linked to the cinema
        Returns:
        List of cinema object related to the cineplex

      • deleteByID

        public static int deleteByID(String cinemaID)
        For admin to delete the cinema by cinemaID.
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - cinemaID that admin has typed in
        Returns:
        Integer representation of deletion status.

      • checklayout

        public static String[] checklayout(String cinemaID)
        Check the size of the cinema
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - cinemaID that the user has chosen
        Returns:
        the number of rows and columns of the cinema

      • updateNumberOfSeats

        public static void updateNumberOfSeats(ArrayList<Cinema> cinemas,
                                       String cinemaID,
                                       String numberOfSeats)
        Update the number of seats in the cinema (By the admin).
        Parameters:
        cinemas - cinamas array that the function will search through
        cinemaID - cinemaID that the admin has chosen
        numberOfSeats - number of seats that the admin wants to update

      • save

        public static void save()
        Save function. Save the cinema objects to the CSV file.
